solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int minMoves2(int[] nums) {--newline--        Arrays.sort(nums);--newline--        int i = 0, j = nums.length-1;--newline--        int count = 0;--newline--        while(i < j){--newline--            count += nums[j]-nums[i];--newline--            i++;--newline--            j--;--newline--        }--newline--        return count;--newline--    }--newline--}
